title: Adaptive Expertise Development Program for Enhancing Context-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental math concepts (equations, functions, statistics) and experience solving real-life problems
context.additional_context: Real-life mathematics problem-solving scenarios using smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: When encountering new mathematical problems, learners can restructure prior knowledge to propose solutions
Learners can model real-world situations in simulated environments and explain the process of applying mathematical approaches
Learners can select optimal solutions by utilizing flexible thinking strategies across diverse problem types

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
